original_text:
And the word of Samuel came to all Israel.
Now Israel went out to battle against the Philistines. They encamped at Ebenezer, and the Philistines encamped at Aphek.

sentences.original_text: And the word of Samuel came to all Israel.
Now Israel went out to battle against the Philistines.
sentences.korean_translation: 이제 이스라엘은 블레셋 사람들과 싸우러 나아갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: and the Philistines encamped at Aphek.
